items.text: offcutter at a length outside off, shuffles to try and set himself up to go over mid-on. But it skews off the outside part of the bat to point
items.postText: Well it was a good call in theory to try and get three overs out of him, but he's held his hamstring first ball. Cramps. Seems like he'll go on...
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length ball going across off stump, whips it to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: chipped towards long-off as he walks down the pitch to try and swipe one over the leg side. Just so difficult to drag this guy into the leg side...
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: nails this pull but finds deep square on the bounce. That was viciously hit. Short of a length ball on the pads
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: whack. Starts too wide this time does Mustafiz. Pitches outside off and it's short, so he can open his arms and slash at this. Gets it over point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR runs

items.text: thick outside edge to third man. Another offcutter, good length outside off. Jabs at it and it goes down there with the angle
items.postText: 42 off 24. Bangladesh have quite a few options in bowling, but I don't expect we'll see the offspinners again. Mortaza has the ball now for his last over. Will they leave the 49th to Shakib? Or will they switch Mustafizur up again next over?
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.preText: Fine leg and third man in. Point and extra cover the other two in the circle.
items.text: short of a length outside off, gets behind the line and swings across the line. Gets an inside edge to short fine

items.preText: Fine leg and third man in. Point and extra cover the other two in the circle.
items.text: short of a length outside off, gets behind the line and swings across the line. Gets an inside edge to short fine
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: clatters it over long-on! What a shot. This is a slow pitch, remember, so it takes some hitting to swipe from under a length ball and clear the leg side. But Shenwari has done exactly that. A clean hit to a ball with some width outside off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samiullah Shinwari, SIX runs

items.text: length ball on the pads, looks to flick and gets a leading edge towards long-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: thigh-high full toss at leg stump, expertly pokes this into the midwicket region and that was two right from the time he thought of it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 2 runs

items.text: beaten. Oh misses out on a length ball. It's angled across the corridor. Point and third man are in. But he looks to club into the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, back in the crease to flick this to deep midwicket
items.postText: Could've had a few more, but that's a good over for Afghanistan. They've got 20 off their last two. They need 31 off their last three. And Bangladesh have a bit of a tactical issue about who will bowl their 49th over now.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length ball across the corridor, shuffles a long way across and punches to deep midwicket against the angle
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: clears deep midwicket who is a long way in from the boundary! Nazmul Shanto is forced to jump up one-handed but he won't get it. Full pace bouncer outside off, Shenwari nails the pull
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samiullah Shinwari, FOUR runs

items.text: Bangladesh review an lbw. Offcutter at a length on the stumps, Shenwari looks to sweep him. This could be both pitching outside leg and missing off. Apart from a possibility of getting glove on it...which he has.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: appeal for lbw as he looks to whip this into the leg side. He's caught on the back foot. That's pitching outside leg...and missing off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: steal the second. Length ball across off, he gets behind it and drags it wide of mid-on. Deep midwicket has a long way to go to his left and he won't stop the second
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, 2 runs

items.text: gets it past short fine! The option's been there and they finally take it. Length ball going across off stump, as it has been. Nabi gets inside the line and flicks it fine. Great skill. And now the pressure is on Bangladesh.
items.postText: 19 off 12. It will be Shakib. What a big over this is.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR runs

items.preText: Third man and fine leg in. Extra cover and midwicket in.
items.text: length ball into the pads, dropped in front of midwicket with soft hands
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: sends it a long way! Another glorious straight hit from Nabi against Shakib. Sees the loop, gets down to meet it at the pitch on off stump and goes with the turn
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, SIX runs

items.text: hits a full toss straight to long-off! Oh that's unfortunate for Nabi. Looks like he wanted to hit it wider but it's come off the toe. He made this a full toss and went inside-out. But Shanto covered good ground and was strong as he took this with a lunge to his left
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Nabi c Najmul Hossain Shanto b Shakib Al Hasan 38 (28b 2x4 2x6) SR: 135.71

items.text: misses out on the short ball. Ooooh big moment. Short and into leg stump. Closes the face too early on the pull and it's a harmless top edge to short fine's right
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: steps out and is beaten on flight, but adjusts nicely to chop this through point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, 2 runs

items.text: misses out on the full toss after stepping out and cutting out some room. Another misses opportunity? Lifts it over cover and Shenwari says no to the second run
items.postText: Well this is it. They've been calling for Rashid all night. He'll face Mustafiz. Eight to get.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, 1 run
